basic.description:
An historical overview and introduction to the philosophical and pedagogical views of Emile Jaques-Dalcroze, Zoltan Kodály and Carl Orff to teaching music.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (12L;12Pc;12G;24O;60P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Dalcroze  Kodaly and Orff

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    MUSC 273/3.0 and MUSC 274/3.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from MUSC 233/3.0; MUSC 333/3.0.
